answers.answer: Hi,The causes of whole body itching along with other symptoms are- Autoimmune hepatitis, Bamforth syndrome, Hyperthyroidism, Sjogren’s syndrome and Type 2 diabetes. Please consult a physician for complete examination, investigations, diagnosis and treatment.  Hope this helps you. Take care and regards!
